meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, 1500 Marilla, Dallas, Texas 75201

agenda_items.title: Welcome
agenda_items.description: Introduction by Andrea Gilles, AICP, Director of Planning and Urban Design.

agenda_items.title: New City Plan Commission Orientation & Refresher
agenda_items.description: Orientation session led by Ryan Mulkey, AICP, Planning Manager.

agenda_items.title: Subdivision Platting Process and Street Name Change Process/Ceremonial Street Name
agenda_items.description: Overview of the subdivision platting process and street name changes presented by Mohammad H. Bordbar.

agenda_items.title: Code of Ethics and Rules for City Officials
agenda_items.description: Discussion on ethics and rules for city officials led by Daniel Moore and Baron Eliason.

agenda_items.title: Keynote Speaker
agenda_items.description: Presentation by James Armstrong, President and CEO of Builders of Hope.

agenda_items.title: Mixed Income Housing Development Bonus
agenda_items.description: Discussion on mixed income housing development presented by Michael V. Pepe.

agenda_items.title: City Plan Commission Annual Report FY22-23 Overview
agenda_items.description: Overview and discussion on the City Plan Commission mission statement led by Andreea Udrea.

agenda_items.title: Overview of New Process Management System - Accela
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the new process management system by Jennifer Munoz.
